title: Chinese Watch
summary: A watch face showing the time in elegant Chinese  characters.
description: Simply shows the time in Chinese.  There are two modes:-- Ordinary, readable text-- A decorative mode that uses financial numerals to show a seal-like patternYou can configure mode and color settings on the watch itself.
descriptionHTML:
Simply shows the time in Chinese. There are two modes:

-- Ordinary, readable text
-- A decorative mode that uses financial numerals to show a seal-like pattern

You can configure mode and color settings on the watch itself.
comments: Very nice Does what it says on the tin -- clear, good looking and configurable.  Would be nice to have more backgrounds and things.
Not working on moto 360 5.1.1 Incorrect display
它的岩石，它推出，它告诉时间
